Megan can't get online till friday, and she loaned me Iron Raptor 
till then.

And no offence to any females about my little comment in this post. 
Its just clean fun!

::Iron Raptor::

Iron Raptor glances at Depth Charge, a bit annoyed at him repeating 
what Prowl had thought to her seconds ago. She didn't need everyone 
giving the same opinion over and over; she could think for herself 
(yes, intelligent females are out there somewhere..)! "I know that, 
Depth Charge. I'm not stupid."

Her eyes narrow as Megaton asks Lunarpine about Veratis's motives. 
She didn't know who Veratis was, but she would be sure to watch 
Lunarpine and Ice carefully from now on.

"Depth Charge, stand down," she says, taking a step toward Megaton.

"My troops' feelings coincide with mine, though," IR was now 
adressing Megaton, "We won't scrap you, because Maximals don't do 
that." Here she gives Depth Charge a small glare, "But I don't think 
an alliance with your faction will not go down well. However, I think 
both of our factions will be relieved at a cease-fire."





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton glances behind him, Depth Charge stood just barely taller 
than him,(cut off the ears and they'd be the same height. "I'm saying 
no such thing Maximal, I merely said that if your group sides with my 
faction I will assist you, You know, you claw my back, I claw yours." 
He looked past Cheetor as if the catbot didn't exist, he tried to 
acknowlege the peeons as little as possible.
